summary: 3 files. 2 skyrim required only, the 3rd Hearthfire and skyrim. A 3 building custom home in Riverwood with all sorts of special features. Npc merchants with quest, adoptions available with TMphoenix Multiple adoption mod. Custom race Family friendly.
descriptionHtml:
Dream Catcher Stronghold and Custom Race
[size=5]                  [/size][u]FamilyFriendly
[/u]Requirments:
Skyrim Only: ForAbandoned Stronghold, and NPC Quest.

Skyrim and Hearthfire: Hearth fire NPC Quest.

Recommendations:
Hearth fireMultiple Adoptions: by Tmphoenix
My Home is yourhome: by Volek
Any follower mod like UFO or AFT. (Tested w/ AFT) 

3 Lodges:Sabrescar Lodge:         
4 beds for followers/ Guards         
Chests for gear and interactionmarkers for NPCs.

Mammoth TuskLodge:         
3 NPCs, 2 of them Merchants. Custom AIPackages         
Alchemist and Blacksmith.         
Containers for the player to storeingredients and potions.         
Chests and Interaction markers forNPCs.

Dragon Eye Lodge:(Player Home)         
7 shield racks (look at wall baskets)         
8 Weapon Plaques         
7 Display Cases (6 Walled)         
4 Dagger wall display cases         
5 Mannequins (7 in abandoned file) NoGlitches!!         
4 Kids beds for Hearth fire file.         
Treasure chests, gear chests, nicesoft master bed.         
Interactive Fireplace. Uses RNDcampfire script, with firewood. 

This is astronghold behind Anises Cabin in Riverwood. Great view of the Lake, and
Navmeshed.

The quest isoptional if you go in Anise’s Cellar and read the note the quest will start and
will tell you where to go. The Quest is a bit weird as you’ll see the third and
forth stage you might end up waiting for the NPCs to get to their locations.
Had it set but then went to change in a clean file and the whole quest wont
trigger, so this is the best I can do, one reason why it’s optional. The key is
In the Thalmor Justiciars Headquarters in case you don’t want to do the quest.

Grey Heads: If yourgood with the CK, Id suggest open it up and CNTL F4 in the actors tab, my NPCs
will be at the top. If not download the Face gen optional file and put it in
your textures, face tint folder.

CustomRace:This is based offthe ancient Germanic Tribe the Harii, I made a mod prior to this, called Sabre
scar Island, but wanted a more home base in Skyrim.The Meshes andTextures are the Vanilla, so even if you have a body mod, it won’t change this
race. I’d suggest you copy and paste your meshes and textures to the folders if
you want them to be less vanilla. Might have to do some photoshop work as well
for the war paint textures.

War Paint??

Benefits of thisrace, The Harii used to attack and sneak on their enemies at night, and douse
themselves in war paint to camouflage. Like Prometheus’ war paint in his Conan
mod, I came up with my own script and added it so your player will have a
custom paint job, face and body. ONLY WORKS FOR HARII RACE, but with any armor,
even custom. Custom weapons Arrows, Bow, and Axe. 6 Hairstyles I mixed and
matched from Apachii’s mod. They also have Night eye Power, since they attacked
at night, its better seeing in the dark. Must have eaten a lot of carrots!!!
Also 10% damage resistant due to their tough native bodies.

Specials:
3 strategic Guardtowers with weapon chests near them.
A fully Smithingset up outside, and alchemy station inside.
That’s a nicecatapult…be a shame if someone…oh wait.., check the pictures!!! Can’t see the
necromancer, go across the lake to find a pressure plate just to the left of
the path for a ring side seat!!!

Two ways ofentering the stronghold, on foot in and out like normal through the gate.
Horse, use the pressure plates near the entrance, then go to the stable, and
hit the pull bars pending on which gate you came in, plus before getting on
your horse to leave hit the pull bar then hit the plate as you leave. If you
find open gates, that should be closed, or vise versa chances are a fox or
rabbit hit the plate.

BUGS:I hate it but the quest is probably the biggest, as the NPCs will take a while to get to their
locations, just be patient and use your imagination a bit and try to dwell in
other areas to give them time to catch up. If your immersive shouldn’t give you
too much as you’ll want to try and dwell in other areas.

Adoption, just maytake a bit for them to get their but that’s not a glitch, just the game.

The interactivecamp fires, can’t use while standing. Not a glitch you need to sneak and insert
the fire wood just like Realistic needs and diseases mod, by Perseid9. It’s his
script. There is a glitch with the torches, as I made it so they don’t respawn
but they do.

SpecialThank:
Stroti for his RusticFurniture Resource Mod.
Apachii for herwonderful Hair Styles.
Perseid9 for hisRealistic Needs and Diseases Mod.
TMPhoenix for hishelp, and awesome Multiple adoption Mod.
Prometheus, thoughnothing of his was used, I liked the War paint idea and utilized my own script.
author: Jrew
